page.title: 11HOME LIFE
page.content:
A DAY IN MY FAMILY'S LIFE My name is Emma Howard. On Sunday, May 31st., the family got up between 6.30 and 8.30am. We all had cereals for breakfast.
My dad went up to his work at New Farm and my mum did a little washing and dusting. My brothers and I played cricket until 10.30 when I went to a Brownie Service at Welsh Frankton when I read a prayer.
My family then went to Lake Vyrnwy by car. It was a beautiful day and a beautiful view. I saw a tower on our walk of about 1km. along the road. We arrived home at 7.3opm. but then we went to 'The Trotting Mare' for tea. I went to bed at 8.30pm. My brothers and my parents went between 10.30 and 11.30pm. after watching television.
